bestech altura altura in spanish means elevation. inspired by the word, bestech went ahead to create one masterpiece that not only boasts of high quality elevation and the overall feel of this fantastic residential community, but also pick one of the finest location in sector 79, gurgaon. why do we believe that this is one of the key locations? well, for starters, each apartment at bestech altura overlooks the serene views of the aravalli hills.  bestech being one of the finest developers and the most well backwardly integrated with inhouse construction and architectural firm has already delivered landmark residential developments in gurgaon with thousands of happy customers who swear by the construction capabilities and designing some of the finest apartment layouts that exist in gurgaon. some of these key developments include the likes of park view city, park view spa, grand spa, bestech sanskriti and many more commercial and retail developments that not only exceed expectations, but also deliver quality and stable assets that can be passed on to generations.  bestech altura is no different, in fact, each product that comes out of the stables of bestech have innovation, new creativity and improvements infused into them to keep the momentum of creating one masterpiece after another. the altura is strategically located at sector 79 in gurgaon, which is just minutes from the spr (southern periphery road). spread over 11 acres approximately, this residential community offers 7 high rise towers with a total of only 532 homes for a select few.  the altura, gurgaon offers a mix of lavish apartment layouts with a combination of 3 & 4 bedroom apartments that would fit into any family size. the most important aspect being the openness that one feels in the apartment with large size running balconies & the high ceilings creating a truly expansive experience within the apartment.  we encourage you to come and visit the bestech altura site where the actual apartment is ready for you to explore, what you see is what you get, so no ambiguity left to chance.

sustainable construction: lavida housing by tata is an igbc pre-certified gold-rated building, showcasing its commitment to environmentally-friendly practices and sustainable construction. health-conscious design: the use of low voc (volatile organic compound) materials ensures a healthier indoor environment while protecting the environment. water conservation: rainwater harvesting techniques are implemented to recharge groundwater levels, promoting water conservation and sustainability. wastewater treatment: the project features a wastewater treatment plant (stp) to treat water, which is then used for landscaping and water-efficient flushing systems, reducing water wastage. native landscaping: the use of indigenous plants across the landscape enhances the natural beauty of the surroundings while promoting biodiversity. spacious layouts: lavida housing offers spacious layouts designed to provide ample living space and comfort. multiutility lifespaces: the project features multiutility lifespaces that cater to the diverse needs and preferences of residents, ensuring convenience and flexibility. best-in-class finishes: lavida housing is characterized by its best-in-class finishes, ensuring a premium living experience for residents. power backup: properties in lavida housing have the advantage of 100% power backup, ensuring uninterrupted electricity supply even during power outages. lavida housing by tata offers a sustainable and environmentally-conscious living experience, featuring an igbc pre-certified gold-rated building, water conservation measures, and low voc materials. with spacious layouts, multiutility lifespaces, and premium finishes, it provides a comfortable and luxurious lifestyle. residents also enjoy the convenience of 100% power backup.
